instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3023 charge sometimes
threads.message:
Hi,

Board is not water damage, inspecting board under microscope didn't find anything unusual.

Board only recognize charger sometimes, I´m trying 2 different 60W original chargers and a power supply with a original cable. 

I have to connect between 10 to 20 times the magsafe to get recognize, once recognize half the time charges normal and don't loose connection, other half of the times, the fan spins for 5 seconds and then shuts down. 

When is not recognize I, in PPDCIN have 2.3V and PPBUS_G3H has only 0.8V.

What should I test next?

threads.title: 820-3023 charge sometimes
threads.message:
If I gently press the SMC, it turns on every time.

You recommend reflow or reballing for this machine?

threads.title: 820-3023 charge sometimes
threads.message:
Possibly input leakage issue.
But lab PSU should bypass it.

Did you try known good LIO board?
Tested disconnecting LIO data flex?
